CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 7, 1956, page 16, reads: "3. Crosley-Bendix appliances made a beautiful stage setting"
TitMainTitle: Crowd of men, and women, including one seated center right wearing striped short sleeved shirt, gathered under banner that reads "Crosley and Bendix Home Appliances Divisions, Avco", at Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair, Syria Mosque
CatSubject_tab: Crowds--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Interiors--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.
